### promoteUniformBitreverseToI32() {#ae7f14d9907d63254543fb2375d87b623}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AMDGPUCodeGenPrepareImpl::promoteUniformBitreverseToI32 (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrinsicinst">IntrinsicInst</a> &amp; I) const</>}>
Promotes uniform &#39;bitreverse&#39; intrinsic <code>I</code> to 32 bit &#39;bitreverse&#39; intrinsic.

<code>I&#39;s</code> base element bit width must be greater than 1 and less than or equal 16. Promotion is done by zero extending the operand to 32 bits, replacing <code>I</code> with 32 bit &#39;bitreverse&#39; intrinsic, shifting the result of 32 bit &#39;bitreverse&#39; intrinsic to the right with zero fill (the shift amount is 32 minus <code>I&#39;s</code> base element bit width), and truncating the result of the shift operation back to <code>I&#39;s</code> original type.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
True.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp/#l00235">235</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp">AMDGPUCodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### promoteUniformOpToI32() {#af5cda76a7708fa48ddc1de837c4fe5e7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AMDGPUCodeGenPrepareImpl::promoteUniformOpToI32 (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator">BinaryOperator</a> &amp; I) const</>}>
Promotes uniform binary operation <code>I</code> to equivalent 32 bit binary operation.

<code>I&#39;s</code> base element bit width must be greater than 1 and less than or equal 16. Promotion is done by sign or zero extending operands to 32 bits, replacing <code>I</code> with equivalent 32 bit binary operation, and truncating the result of 32 bit binary operation back to <code>I&#39;s</code> original type. Division operation is not promoted.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if <code>I</code> is promoted to equivalent 32 bit binary operation, false otherwise.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp/#l00202">202</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp">AMDGPUCodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.
